abstract_problem: A regional railway operator manages a single rail corridor with {num_stations} stations served by {num_trains} trains. The goal is to schedule the trains to minimize the weighted sum of arrival times at specific key stations, subject to strict deadlines and safety headway constraints. Each train has a specific weight reflecting its priority or passenger load. Certain trains must depart from or arrive at specific stations before a given deadline. Additionally, for safety reasons, a minimum headway of {headway_minutes} minutes must be maintained between any two consecutive trains at every station (both for arrival and departure).

parameters.description:
Global instance parameters. Columns: `parameter`, `value`. Includes `num_trains`, `num_stations`, and `headway_minutes`.
Data format: | parameter | value |
|---|---|
| num_trains | 5 |
| num_stations | 5 |
| headway_minutes | 2.0 |

distances.description:
Track segments between consecutive stations and their nominal running times. Columns: `segment_id`, `from_station`, `to_station`, `distance` (minutes).
Data format: | segment_id | from_station | to_station | distance |
|---|---|---|---|
| 1 | 1 | 2 | 5 |
| 2 | 2 | 3 | 5 |

scheduled_timetable.description:
Base timetable with scheduled arrival and departure times. Columns: `train_id`, `station_id`, `scheduled_arrival_time`, `scheduled_departure_time`.
Data format: | train_id | station_id | scheduled_arrival_time | scheduled_departure_time |
|---|---|---|---|
| 1 | 1 | 8.0 | 8.0 |
| 1 | 2 | 13.0 | 16.0 |

deadlines.description:
Hard deadlines for specific train events. Columns: `train_id`, `station_id`, `type` (departure/arrival), `deadline` (minutes).
Data format: | train_id | station_id | type | deadline |
|---|---|---|---|
| 3 | 2 | departure | 48.0 |
| 4 | 1 | departure | 56.0 |

objective_weights.description:
Specific objective function terms. Minimizes sum of (weight * arrival_time) for each train at specific stations. Columns: `train_id`, `station_id`, `weight`.
Data format: | train_id | station_id | weight |
|---|---|---|
| 1 | 4 | 300 |
| 1 | 5 | 310 |
